traits.name: Aura of Blood Thirst
entries: If the flind isn't {@condition incapacitated}, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The flind makes three attacks: one with each of its different flail attacks or three with its longbow.

actions.name: Flail of Madness
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must make a melee attack against a random target within its reach on its next turn. If it has no targets within its reach even after moving, it loses its action on that turn.

actions.name: Flail of Pain
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 22 (4d10 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flail of Paralysis
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 damage) piercing damage.
